meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shadi Peterman Ryan Kious Justin Vossler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7584.

td.p: Shadi Peterman, a high school history teacher from St. Louis, Missouri
Ryan Kious, a social media and web writer from Albuquerque, New Mexico
Justin Vossler, a high school history teacher from Homer, New York (whose 5-day cash winnings total $110,000)

tr.td: STATE FLAGS
PENNANTS
THE JOLLY ROGER
THE "STAR"S & "STRIPE"S
TRY COLOR
THE UNION, JACK

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the North Star

Justin
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This star is on the flags of both Alaska & Maine')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This star is on the flags of both Alaska & Maine

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'On Aug. 13, 1969 this team was 9.5 games back but somehow ended up winning the NL pennant; a miracle, perhaps?')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: On Aug. 13, 1969 this team was 9.5 games back but somehow ended up winning the NL pennant; a miracle, perhaps?

tr.td: He founded the town of Providence on land he acquired from the Narragansett Indians

tr.td: Facing forward, it's a boat's right-hand side

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Shadi: What is evening blue--or [*]?)
[ERRATUM: Research done by former Nike project manager and Crayola collector Ed Welter in the years 2000-2014 suggests that a number of Crayola colors were renamed prior to the 1958 renaming of Prussian blue.]

midnight blue

Shadi
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', 'The first Crayola to get a name change was Prussian blue, which became this timely blue')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The first Crayola to get a name change was Prussian blue, which became this timely blue

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', 'Most casualties suffered by the Union in the Civil War came about not due to combat but rather this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Most casualties suffered by the Union in the Civil War came about not due to combat but rather this

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows the California state flag on the monitor.) Designed in 1846, the bear flag of California has a 5-pointed star, originally an allusion to this state that also fought for independence from Mexico')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows the California state flag on the monitor.) Designed in 1846, the bear flag of California has a 5-pointed star, originally an allusion to this state that also fought for independence from Mexico

toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Shadi: Who are the Yankees?)
...
(Alex: National League.)

the Giants

RyanShadi
')

Ryan

BOTANY

$9,601

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
